name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.0.0-92f93ac2dbf4c21bd04e1cff6b1d274c59e6c9eb "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
